content.question: Supporters of voting restrictions are most likely to make which of the following arguments?

choices.label: Voting restrictions are needed to reduce the length of time it takes to vote.
Voting restrictions are needed to prevent voter fraud.
Voting restrictions help reduce the cost of elections.
Voting restrictions increase the accuracy of tracking polls.

content.answer: Voting restrictions are needed to prevent voter fraud.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Describe the argument, perspective, evidence, and reasoning presented in the source.
